participant_1.background:
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
I'm a talented singer, but I'm afraid to tell my parents because they might want me to perform in public.
i m fabulous from my on trend haircut to my louis vuittons.
I am single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
I try to feel younger by spending time with my cat.

participant_2.background:
I think of silly nicknames for my older brother, and then I start to wonder if people are thinking nice things about him when they hear them.
I like to dress up to impress, but comfort is the key to my happiness.
I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot.
I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
i want people to think i m cool.

content.text: I love how comfy my clothes are. I'm not sure if I'm cool or not though. What about you?
I think I'm pretty cool. I like to dress up to impress, but comfort is the key to my happiness.
I agree. Sometimes I like to dress up and feel like a princess.
I like to think of silly nicknames for my older brother. I wonder if people think nice things about him when they hear them.
It's nice that you worry about your brother. I'm single and enjoy the freedom of being able to focus on my art.
I'm looking for a new place to live that is close to my favorite fishing spot. I'm learning to swim and I'm doing my best.
That's great. I'm trying to feel younger by spending time with my cat.
I'm not sure if my cat likes me or not. I hope he does.
I think your cat loves you. Cats don't like everyone.
Thanks. I think so too. I'm glad I have him.
